Transfix | NYC (On-site) | Transfer visa only Relocation provided

Transfix is reinventing trucking logistics with technology (think Uber for trucking, the industry is ripe for automation!). We recently landed our Series B funding at $22M.

We're looking for front-end and back-end developers (3+ yrs) to join the team. We're working on building RESTful services, transitioning to SaaS platform, improving parallelization, and machine learning for pricing.

Interview process: Initial phone screen with me (20 min), tech screen (1hr), final on-site interview (3hrs)

To hear more, email michelle@transfix.io http://transfix.io/
